slo.name: API Request Success Rate
slo.description: Ensure 99% of API requests succeed over 30 days

sli.name: api_success_rate
sli.description: Ratio of successful API requests out of total requests

alerts.name: api_slo_alert
alerts.description: Trigger alert when error budget burn exceeds threshold

explanation: This SLO focuses on API availability using Prometheus success rate queries. Burn alerts help detect when the error budget is consumed too quickly, protecting reliability targets.
